description: Bell attributes the leak to "an anonymous hacker" and says it is working with the RCMP.
title: 1.9 million Bell customer email addresses stolen by 'anonymous hacker'

author: WIRED Staff
description: Die mit ihren Leaks für den WannaCry-Angriff mitverantwortlichen Hacker der Shadow Brokers-Gruppe kündigen weitere Exploits an.
title: Shadow Brokers: Hacker drohen mit neuen Leaks

author: Alle Beiträge von dpa  anzeigen.
description: Ist Nordkorea für das Cyberprogramm „WannaCry“ verantwortlich? Internetexperten haben Ähnlichkeiten der Hacker-Codes zu denen der nordkoreanischen Gruppe Lazarus erkannt.
title: Internetexperten: „WannaCry“ ähnelt Hacker-Codes aus Nordkorea

author: Nathan McAlone
description: Hackers are holding a Disney movie for ransom, but Disney isn't paying up, according to a new report from The Hollywood Reporter.
title: Hackers are holding a Disney movie for ransom, according to CEO Bob Iger

author: Nathan McAlone, Business Insider
description: Hackers are holding a Disney movie for ransom, but Disney isn't paying up, according to a new report from The Hollywood Reporter.
title: Hackers are holding a Disney movie for ransom, according to CEO Bob Iger

author: By Amanda Ulrich For Dailymail.com
description: Walt Disney CEO Bob Iger said in a meeting on Monday that an upcoming Disney movie was being held for ransom. Iger said hackers and stolen the film and were demanding to be paid in Bitcoin.
title: Hackers threaten to release stolen Disney blockbuster

author: Hope Corrigan
description: Hackers are demanding a large sum to be paid in bitcoin to not release the latest Pirates of the Caribbean film early.
title: Hackers Reportedly Holding Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales Hostage, Demand Ransom - IGN

author: Christopher Palmeri
description: Walt Disney Co. Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger said hackers claim to have stolen an unreleased film and are threatening to distribute it online if they aren’t paid a ransom. The company is declining to do so.
title: Disney's Iger Says Hackers Claim to Be Holding Movie for Ransom

author: Jörn Brien
description: Die Hackergruppe „Shadow Brokers“ hat gedroht, sensible Bankdaten und Atomprogramme zu veröffentlichen. Außerdem wollen die Hacker gefährliche Schadsoftware verkaufen, wie sie mitteilten.
title: „Shadow Brokers“: Hacker wollen Bankdaten und Atomprogramme veröffentlichen

author: Jeff Daniels
description: Staying one step ahead of bad guys is one of the reasons the Air Force is now inviting hackers to join an upcoming bug bounty challenge.
title: Air Force seeking hackers as military prepares for its largest bug bounty program yet
